structure.unit: SOVEREIGNTY AND JURISDICTION OF THE COMMONWEALTH

law.history: Repealed 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406,sec. 336, effective January 1, 1975. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2711a-236.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Displaying or carrying in parade anarchistic or immoral flag.
